name: Luxury Car - Explore City
description:
Luxury Car - Explore City is most extreme car racing simulator. Drive the most furious racing and sports cars at illegal speeds, drift all around the almost-endless widest open city ever seen game, and race the traffic. Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you! Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt of this open world city! Try to disable all assists and drift and drag!
Features:
- Richly detailed car model.
- Accurate physics.
- You get realistic acceleration.
- Car damage is extremely realistic.
- It's very simple to select a drive mode.
- Plenty of camera settings.
- Great graphics.
